name: Amir Hamza
reviews: I have seen my friends wearing watches of different colors and shapes and so when I asked my parents, they were willing to get me this watch.

name: Ayob Ali
reviews: The watch that I got was really beautifully and trendy. It was the Ben 10 watch, which I am very fond of.

name: Shohel shak
reviews: Inside the dial, the base is white in color. The numbers in the dial are all fluorescent and therefore it glows at night.

name: Billal
reviews: The minute needle and the secondâ€™s needle also have their tips translucent, so at night, even that glows.

name: Soinik
reviews: The most attractive feature of this watch is the flexibility of the strap.

name: Jewel
reviews: Apart from bending and wrapping to the wrist, it could also be folded in many shapes and designs
